Description: ESP LTD MG-750 Electric Guitar w/ Floyd Rose & Hard Case An excellent ESP/LTD MG-750 Electric Guitar!!! It has a beautiful Green Flame finish, a 24 fret Rosewood fretboard with offset small block inlay, Black hardware, reverse headstock, and a Floyd Rose lic. locking tremolo with the whammy bar. It has 2 humbucker pickups that sound great! It is 25.5 scale, the neck width at the nut is 1 & 5/8", and it weighs 8.4 pounds. The condition is almost excellent(an 8.9 out of 10) with light normal signs of use and shows just slight fret wear, the guitar is really nice all around with no problems except for light playing scratches and a couple dings(See pics). Serial#W0218474, made in Korea in 2002, includes the excellent ESP hard case with owners manual. USA Shipping, handling, and insurance charge will be $50 in USPS's deliverable USA 48 states. International shipment and handling is $150 for most other countries via USPS's deliverable Priority Mail International delivery plus you may have to pay import taxes/duties to import and it may take 45 days or longer to receive(Only the smaller less populated countries will take that long, not the mainstream well populated countries). The shipping and handling charge will be $100 for Canada delivery. I reserve all rights. Here is a list the countries that I can and will ship to without any problems for the stated fixed shipping prices: Austria, Belgium, Canada, China(Express), Czech Republic, Denmark, England, Finland, France, Germany, Great Britain and Northern Ireland, Greece, Hong Kong, Ireland, Japan, South Korea(Express), Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Russia Federation(Express), South Korea(Express), Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom, Vatican City I always declare and insure for the full purchase price, no exceptions. Check out my other auctions as I usually have guitars and parts for sale. I buy and sell quality musical instruments and have over 7000 positive Ebay feedbacks so bid with confidence that you will receive quality merchandise as described, shipped promptly and securely. I also have been playing lead guitar since 1979. I try to describe the condition of the guitars I sell the best I can using the Bluebook of Electric Guitars photo grading system and the shipping rates stated above are a flat fixed rate and covers the shipping, handling, and insurance. Colorado sales must add 4.6% sales tax. No trades. Please... Only bid if you have all the money NOW, and will send me the payment if you are the winning bidder. I sometimes miss a day checking my email so please be patient and I will try to respond to all questions ASAP. Thanks, and good luck bidding.
Title: ESP LTD MG-750 Electric Guitar w/ Floyd Rose & Hard Case
